lead_paragraph: Ms. James said that because of a computer system’s shortcomings, children had been deprived of assistance and the city had lost out on Medicaid reimbursements.

headline.print_headline: Education Dept. Is Sued  Over Its Disability Services
headline.main: Letitia James, New York Public Advocate, Sues Education Dept. Over Schools’ Disability Services

snippet: Ms. James said that because of a computer system’s shortcomings, children had been deprived of assistance and the city had lost out on Medicaid reimbursements.
abstract: New York City Public Advocate Letitia James files suit against Education Dept over $130 million computer system that is supposed to track services for students with disabilities; suit claims system is failure and children have as result been deprived of needed assistance, which has also resulted in city losing hundreds of millions of dollars in Medicare reimbursements.
